title: Nearly Nine
summary: This flash fiction piece (clocking in at 487 words) won the first ever Mash Stories competition in the first quarter of 2014. It was also recorded as an audio piece by the Mash Stories podcast team.

title: A Helping Hand
summary: This 488-word flash fiction piece was shortlisted for the third quarter of the Mash Stories competition in 2014. It was also recorded as an audio piece by the Mash Stories podcast team. It did not win that quarter, and I am totally okay with that.
